title: New Justia AI Writer
description: We recently completed the creation of the Justia AI Writer tool, exclusively for use by Justia Elevate website clients. Our user-friendly tool takes the guesswork out of AI for law firms, so all you need to do to generate content is tell the system your desired practice areas, subtopics, and target location. Then, a high-quality draft of key webpage content will be readily generated while you focus on your practice. Login to your site editor and click “Justia AI” to get started on creating a new page today!
